name: Zelda Musou - Hyrule All-Stars [3DS]
description:
All star battles!! Deadly Musou Rush! Rousing action! Character-original moves & attacks! 30 Heroes from 13 Franchises!! The very first all-stars title for Koei Tecmo!
For the first time in Warriors series, flashy action combines both the traits of the original series and new exiting elements such as “Musou Rush”, open scenarios and multiple endings! Enjoy the epic story of collaboration of heroes that brakes the borders of diverse range of worlds!
